studyUpdaterUpdaterURL.title: Updater URL
studyUpdaterUpdaterURL.description: REST Endpoint URL for the external Updater service (f.e. Study Update CSV RS)

studyUpdaterUpdaterProperty.title: Updater Properties
studyUpdaterUpdaterProperty.description: Properties for Updater specific configuration in the form <name>=<value> - f.e. Seperator=,
